title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks mixed after Dow hits correction, Nasdaq enters bear market - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks mixed after Dow hits correction, Nasdaq enters bear market  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. equities struggled for direction Tuesday after a sell-off in the earlier session that saw the Dow Jones Industrial Average fall into correction territory and the Nasdaq enter a bear market. Fears of a recession spurred by concerns over the economic consequences of Russiaâ€™s war in Ukraine have prompted investors to jettison stocks and stockpile safe-haven assets in recent days.
